Title: How to Become a Business Analyst
Short Intro: Gain foundational data skills applicable to any industry. Collect and analyze data, model business scenarios, and communicate your findings with SQL, Excel, and Tableau.
Skills: Business KPIs, Spreadsheet Functions, Forecast Modeling in Spreadsheets, Quantitative Data Visualization, SQL JOINs, SQL Aggregations, Data Visualization in Spreadsheets, Data Validation in Spreadsheets, Data Visualization Design, Data Storytelling, Growth Metrics
